localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: FilterPixel is an AI desktop application that helps photographers to select photos faster. Get rid of your tedious, tiring & time-consuming photo selection process so that you can spend more time doing what you love.
blogPost.body: FilterPixel is an AI desktop application that helps photographers to select photos faster. Get rid of your tedious, tiring & time-consuming photo selection process so that you can spend more time doing what you love.
blogPost.title: FilterPixel - AI based photo selection for photographers
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面应用程序，可以帮助摄影师更快地选择照片。摆脱乏味、疲惫和耗时的照片选择过程，这样你就可以花更多的时间做你喜欢的事情。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的摄影师照片选择

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面應用程序，可以幫助攝影師更快地選擇照片。擺脫乏味、疲憊和耗時的照片選擇過程，這樣你就可以花更多的時間做你喜歡的事情。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的攝影師照片選擇

previous.excerpt: The Real-time WallStreetBets sentiment tracker measures the sentiment in the reddit forum. They also track WSB market sentiment relative to market (SPY) and have a WallStreetBets Index to monitor intraday price action of popular stocks that are discussed
previous.title: r/WallStreetBets Sentiment Analysis -  Measure sentiment on the popular reddit forum

localize.description: 实时WallStreetBets情绪追踪器衡量了reddit论坛中的情绪。他们还跟踪WSB市场情绪相对于市场（SPY），并有一个WallStreetBets指数来监测讨论的热门股票的盘中价格走势。
localize.tagline: 在热门的reddit论坛上测量情绪。

localize.description: 實時WallStreetBets情緒追蹤器衡量了reddit論壇中的情緒。他們還跟蹤WSB市場情緒相對於市場（SPY），並有一個WallStreetBets指數來監測討論的熱門股票的盤中價格走勢。
localize.tagline: 在熱門的reddit論壇上測量情緒。

next.excerpt: Fibery is a connected workspace for product teams. It unites user research, ideation, strategic planning, product roadmapping, software development and customer feedback aggregation. Escape scattered tools and make better products with Fibery.
next.title: Fibery for Product Teams - All-in-one platform to invent, build and grow your products

localize.description: Fibery是一个产品团队的互联工作空间。它将用户研究、构思、战略规划、产品路线图、软件开发和客户反馈汇总等工作统一起来。摆脱分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的产品。
localize.tagline: 一体化平台，让您发明、构建和发展您的产品。

localize.description: Fibery是一個產品團隊的互聯工作空間。它將用戶研究、構思、戰略規劃、產品路線圖、軟件開發和客戶反饋彙總等工作統一起來。擺脫分散的工具，用Fibery做出更好的產品。
localize.tagline: 一體化平臺，讓您發明、構建和發展您的產品。
